direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, but based on different criteria.
Both methods involve filtering elements based on a condition and modifying the collection.
Both methods modify the collection, but clear() removes all elements, while retainAll retains specific elements.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a queue to be initialized before performing operations.
Environment setup is required before modifying the queue.
Both methods verify the state of the queue and handle similar exceptions.
